title: Mobile-Based Short-Term Course for Developing Scientific Literacy Awareness

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and mobile device usage experience
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive program implementing nature of science and epistemological approaches via mobile platforms in elementary teacher training

learning_goals: Learners can identify five key epistemological elements explaining the process of scientific knowledge generation through mobile activities.
Learners can analyze at least three cases of scientific theory variability and social context dependency using the mobile-NOS model.
Learners can evaluate the tentativeness and falsifiability of scientific knowledge with over 80% accuracy via digital quizzes and discussion apps.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
